mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(TXT_NO, CATE_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ATT_FILE) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nCate}, 4, #{nTitle}, #{nCon}, #{nFile})
mapper.select: SELECT TXT_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS S_DT, ATT_FILE, SUBSTR(ATT_FILE, 21) AS ATT_UFILE, H.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM NOTICE N INNER JOIN HQ_USER H ON N.USER_NO = H.USER_NO WHERE TXT_NO = #{nNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{nTitle}, CONTENT = #{nCon} WHERE TXT_NO = #{nNo}
UPDATE NOTICE SET DEL_FLAG = 0 WHERE TXT_NO = #{nNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CATE_NO, CATE_NAME FROM NOTICE_CATE WHERE DEL_FLAG = 1

AND USER_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR ID LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HQ_USER (USER_NO, AUTH_NO, DEP_NO, ID, PW, USER_NAME, PHONE_NUM, ENROLL_DATE, DIVISION) VALUES (HQ_USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uAuto}, #{uDep}, #{uId}, #{uPw}, #{uNm}, #{uPhone}, SYSDATE, 0)

INSERT INTO BRCH (BRCH_NO, ID, PW, BRCH_NAME, POST_NUM, DFT_ADDRESS, DTL_ADDRESS, CALL_NUM, MGR_NAME, MGR_PHONE_NUM, DIVISION) VALUES (BRCH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bId}, #{bPw}, #{bNm}, #{bPost}, #{bDft}, #{bDtl}, #{bCall}, #{bMgrNm}, #{bPhone}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NO, U.AUTH_NO, U.DEP_NO, U.DEP_NAME, U.ID, U.PW, U.USER_NAME, U.PHONE_NUM, U.E_DT, U.D_DT FROM (SELECT H.USER_NO, H.AUTH_NO, H.DEP_NO, D.DEP_NAME, H.ID, H.PW, H.USER_NAME, H.PHONE_NUM, TO_CHAR(H.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS E_DT, TO_CHAR(H.DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS D_DT FROM HQ_USER H INNER JOIN HQ_DEP D ON H.DEP_NO = D.DEP_NO) U WHERE U.USER_NO IN #{uNo}
SELECT BRCH_NO, ID, PW, BRCH_NAME, POST_NUM, DFT_ADDRESS, DTL_ADDRESS, CALL_NUM, MGR_NAME, MGR_PHONE_NUM FROM BRCH WHERE BRCH_NO IN #{uNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE HQ_USER SET AUTH_NO = #{hAuth}, DEP_NO = #{hDep}, ID = #{hId}, PW = #{hPw}, USER_NAME = #{hNm}, PHONE_NUM = #{hPhone} WHERE USER_NO IN #{uNo}
UPDATE HQ_USER SET DEL_FLAG = 0, DEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = #{uNo}
